name: @pandemic/venue-host
description: Local LAN venue host for cross-platform P2P audio sharing

scripts.pkg:all: npm run bundle && pkg dist-bundle/index.cjs --targets node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64,node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --output bin/pandemic-venue-host --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:mac: npm run bundle && pkg dist-bundle/index.cjs --targets node18-macos-arm64 --output bin/pandemic-venue-host-mac --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:win: npm run bundle && pkg dist-bundle/index.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output bin/pandemic-venue-host-win --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:linux: npm run bundle && pkg dist-bundle/index.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64 --output bin/pandemic-venue-host-linux --compress GZip
